description.standard:
Starting your crypto trading journey or already a pro trader? Use Bitstamp's app for a secure and easy introduction to buying and selling crypto on the longest running crypto exchange. 


Trade Cryptocurrency on the original crypto exchange includes Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Dogecoin (DOGE) and many other cryptocurrencies. Enjoy advanced trading functionality, manage orders, no fees & trade crypto on the go on a secure crypto exchange. 
BUY CRYPTO AND TRADE UP TO 40 CRYPTOCURRENCIES SECURELY 


Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Dogecoin (DOGE), Shiba Inu (SHIB), Polkadot (DOT), Cardano (ADA), Apecoin (APE), Avalanche (AVAX), Litecoin (LTC) and many more including USDC and USDT. 
  
SIMPLE TRADING FOR CRYPTO BEGINNERS WITH BITSTAMP BASIC MODE 
* Easy sign-up with seamless experience & intuitive interface 
* Buy/sell crypto and digital currency instantly 
* Buy crypto with a credit/debit card, bank transfer, Google Pay, or PayPal 
* Pay the price you see with spread-based pricing, no added trading fees 
* Instantly withdraw your crypto 
* Use an exchange that holds 100% of user assets in reserve & under 1:1 custody 
* Secure your funds with strong data encryption & MultiSig technology 
* Feel confident that Bitstamp stores 95% of all crypto assets in cold wallets 
  
ADVANCED INTERFACE FOR PRO CRYPTO TRADERS WITH BITSTAMP PRO MODE 
* Trade crypto and digital currencies with competitive pricing 
* Trade BTC, ETH, SHIB, MATIC, USDC and many more cryptocurrencies across the world of crypto 
* Access to real-time market insights, including order book, last trades, market depth, and charts for all assets 
* Advanced offline crypto storage and custody solutions with non-stop availability and unrivaled uptime 
* Instant trade execution and real-time data streams are available 24/7 via institutional-grade Nasdaq technology 
  
ABOUT BITSTAMP GLOBAL CRYPTO TRADING APP 
Bitstamp is the world’s original and longest-running cryptocurrency exchange, supporting traders and leading financial institutions since 2011. With a proven track record, cutting-edge market infrastructure and dedication to personal customer service with a human touch, Bitstamp, a secure and reliable trading platform, is trusted by more than 4 million customers worldwide. Whether through its intuitive web platform, crypto trading app or industry-leading APIs, Bitstamp is where crypto enters finance. 
  
Bitstamp USA, Inc. is licensed to engage in Virtual Currency Business Activity by the New York State Department of Financial Services. 
*Due to regulatory requirements, Buy and Sell options in the Bitstamp app are disabled for users residing in New York State.

developerResponse.body: Hi, thank you for your kind review and great suggestions! I've forwarded them to our dev team who will consider including them in one of our regular updates :)

attributes.review:
Hi,
Plain and simple if you want an app for crypto trading with indicators this is the best I’ve seen so far.

That being said since I don’t see a feedback option in app I’ll leave it here. Using both the app and the website often I will say it’s frustrating that so much functionality is lost between the two. Some customization for your indicators on app would be great because dark mode is your enemy since you can’t change indie colors and dark blue for keltner channels makes them impossible to see.

Also when trying to look at specific bar volume with your finger on the chart not being able to just move your finger to check certain price levels and such is frustrating, the entire chart moves rendering the feature useless.

This is my main crypto exchange, it is far superior to coinbase pro even with the lack of customization but I would still love to see these improvements over time.

Thank you for reading, use this app, that is all.
attributes.title: Love the app, some suggestions

developerResponse.body:
Our KYC procedures are conducted with the intention to continue providing a safe and stable trading environment, as well as protect our clients from being exposed to risks associated with money laundering and all sorts of scams. 

Our agent will gladly assist you if you reply to the ongoing ticket.

attributes.review:
Quite simply these people can decide to keep your money whenever they please- they have no conscience no compassion and I had used the service without trouble for many years. No explanation except to try to violate every privacy law there is and hold thousands of my dollars hostage- the crisis has hit my family particular hard, as such I have not had time to address this issue until now but if they don’t release funds penalties and interest soon I intend to file criminally and a civil case to follow- in essence they have stolen thousands from my family- it’s time for them to seriously pay- do not use this app- you’ve been warned!!!

As you can see there is no ongoing ticket or any explanation here as to a very templates answer on their part- I think that things as they are today might help in our suits which I think now are forthcoming- but I’m after the license- want to stop this from happening to anyone else- using KYC on a customer as an excuse, one who had been that customer for over 2 years without a hitch then absconding his family’s money without a word as to why is if little comfort - apathy folks, pure and simple. They just want to make excuses and care only for themselves while they lie and steal from their own public... sound familiar?
attributes.title: Caveat Emptor

developerResponse.body: Hi, we're sorry to hear your experience with us wasn't as you hoped. If you ever decide to use our services again, don't hesitate to write to us at support@bitstamp.net as we'll be more than happy to help you out with trading or any issues/questions you have.

attributes.review: Do not open account until after you done your due diligence on this exchange. Please research high amount of withdrawal complaints prior to performing KYC. I made the mistake and didn’t research anything about this exchange and I regret it. Luckily my loss was minimum but it’s still my money I cannot withdraw. These reviews are to assist people in the good and bad experiences dealing with companies. It’s just not an app but a company behind the app. Bitstamp do offer phone support but resolution is none existent. Yeah I can call but it doesn’t do any good a lot of other people stated this fact. Email support is like a lot of other exchanges very slow and they get it wrong or just stop responding. Personally I think these reviews should alert Apple and they need to investigate Bitstamp for accountability. Again, make sure people that you slow down and take your time to research.
attributes.title: Do NOT Open Account

developerResponse.body:
Thank you for your feedback.

In regards to XRP, we're closely monitoring the unfolding situation and we'll continue to respond accordingly.

attributes.review:
Positive things first: Their charts for the mobile app are easier to read than most of the bigger players out there like Coinbase and Uphold. Their fiat ramp is quick and the KYC process is expedient. Up until now I’ve enjoyed their trading experience overall. 

Negative aspects: They have a poor selection of alt coins from which to choose. BUT they exchange 2 stable coins and BTC and... up until now XRP. Sadly, they lack the fortitude to continue carrying the 3rd/4th largest alt coin due to the recent lawsuit alleged by the SEC. While it carries no legal ramifications to exchange XRP during this time period, and the outcome of the SEC-XRP struggle will effect all cryptocurrency, not just XRP, it shows Bitstamp has no backbone to stand behind it’s customers. So for now, I will be taking my business to Uphold, Bianance and Coinbase Pro.
attributes.title: Lack of Leadership

developerResponse.body: We're very sorry to hear about your experience, but happy to hear the issue was resolved in the end. We hope you can give Bitstamp another chance in the future.

attributes.review: Horrible customer service. Froze my account and continually gave me no reason why I could not pull my money out citing, “ongoing internal procedures”. I provided all documentation and asked everyday if anything else was needed, but was just given no specific reason. Even if they gave me some sort of reason or specific type of internal process they were running, I would have been understanding.  I think they were just holding my money for 30 days because on the 30th day exactly, my money was released. Month is a long time in my opinion. Closed my account and moved my money over to eToro. BitStamp interface is cleaner, but moved for customer service and execution is same.
attributes.title: Extremely Difficult to Get Your Money Out

attributes.review: I recently downloaded this app, I signed up and filled in my info, then to make deposits you have to protect your account through 2 factor Authentication app, I struggled with that for days and calling and emailing support for help but unfortunately no help came as email support takes decades to reply to emails. I was so determined I had to figure a way out myself, upon fixing 2FA without supports help, I was told by app to verify to Level 2 to have unlimited deposits and withdrawals, after collecting sensitive and personal info I got an email my account verification was successful, I went into the app and clicked on on deposit, I stumbled upon a message saying “DEPOSITS ARE CURRENTLY DISABLED” I reached out to support on several occasions but no feedback till now. What an awful experience.
attributes.title: Worse App Ever

developerResponse.body: Hi, we instantly process ACH withdrawal transfers on our end once they are confirmed, however we cannot speak for the timeframe required by the receiving bank to credit the funds to your account.

attributes.review: This app is straight CRAP! If you’re looking to invest, I wouldn’t trust your money here! I promise these people don’t care about YOUR money. Went to make my FIRST withdrawal (using the instant option) ITS NOT INSTANT! So, I called and they said none of their options are instant (even though it CLEARLY says instant) The guy told me it would take 2-5 business days to deposit into your account. Ok, so what’s the other option? Oh, that’s a wire transfer that also charges a $25 fee to transfer. Ok...so, how long does that take? 2-7 days. This app and their policies are SO misleading! Don’t waste your time or money on this app! If you’re looking to invest in cryptocurrency and need something that’s ACTUALLY easy to use and ACTUALLY does what they say, shoot over to Robinhood instead. Because Bitstamp is a JOKE!
attributes.title: What a load of CROC!

developerResponse.body: Hi, we're sorry you feel this way. Even though we have certain security procedures in place, we understand how inconvenient the process and waiting time can be and appreciate your patience. Rest assured that our team will provide relevant updates via email. Otherwise, you are always welcome to reach out to us at support@bitstamp.net and we'll look into it.

attributes.review: Even though you only have a couple of thousand dollars, they could lock your account without giving you any reasons. They could disabled buy and sell and not allowed you to close your account. Even though they have a so-called complaint email, the result is the same. If you called supports, the front end wouldn't find any reasons why the account is like that and they always said they would report another department to resolve issues as soon as possible, but a couple of weeks passed and nothing would be resolved. If you lost money because you couldn't sell your crypto, they would not be responsible for it.  It's very terrible and unbelievable services
attributes.title: Unbelievable services

developerResponse.body: Hi, we're sorry to hear that. While we understand the inconvenience they may cause, our KYC procedures are conducted in order for us to continue providing a safe and secure exchange as well as to comply with our regulatory obligations. We would invite you to reach us at support@bitstamp.net in case of any questions or doubts regarding the procedure as we'll be happy to help you out.

attributes.review: These people are the absolute worst in the industry. I used many different exchanges including Coinbase and Binance without any issues. After using Bitstamp, there is no doubt in my mind why they are losing business to their competitors. I have already wasted ten hours of my life trying to go through their KYC procedure over and over again. It is as if they intentionally make it difficult for you so you cannot ever move your money out. We now have a family emergency where a surgery is needed and I cannot even sell my crypto. I hope your business goes bankrupt soon so you do not do this to someone else.
attributes.title: The worst crypto exchange ever

developerResponse.body: Hi, we're sorry to hear this. Please note that security of our clients' accounts is of utmost importance to us which is why we have certain procedures in place. We do not confiscate our clients' funds and will get back to you as soon as we're finished processing your case. You're also welcome to email us at support@bitstamp.net so we can check on your case.

attributes.review: Seriously I can’t recommend this app to anyone anymore and if you’re seeing this you have to run away from it. I can’t believe I deposited my money into the app and traded for crypto, unfortunately, I can’t take them out had to contact the support gave them the necessary info, and had a zoom call which I think it’s nice just to protect my account. After the procedure I was told to hold on some minutes then I will be able to withdraw from my wallet I didn’t get any response to date and my money is there no one is fixing that yet and it’s annoying. Kindly stay away from bjtstamp
attributes.title: Worst crypto app

description.standard:
Whether you are new to digital tokens or a professional trader, Bitfinex is your one-stop-shop for all your crypto needs. The Bitfinex mobile app adapts the full functionality of our web platform for seamless on-the-go trading. Please visit our Terms of Service to learn more https://www.bitfinex.com/legal/exchange/terms 

BUY AND SELL HUNDREDS OF DIGITAL ASSETS EASILY 
Buy and sell Bitcoin, Ethereum, Tether tokens, Cardano, Dogecoin, and hundreds of other cryptocurrencies directly from your mobile device. 

TRADE LIKE A PRO
Bitfinex provides advanced services for Digital Tokens traders and liquidity providers. Traders can enjoy exchange and margin, trading and lending functionalities with fast execution thanks to our industry-leading liquidity.

We’ve built leading-edge trading tools to help you trade with confidence and pick from a range of digital assets. With Bitfinex, you will be able to access real-time market data, customize your charts, set up advanced order types, receive price alerts and trade notifications at your fingertips. 

RECEIVE REWARDS WITH STAKING 
Support the operations of the blockchain network by staking. Watch your account grow as Bitfinex automatically deposits your staking rewards into your account on a weekly basis.  To learn more about that feature, please visit https://staking.bitfinex.com 

BORROW MADE SIMPLE 
Experience the transparency and power of peer-to-peer funding, where borrowers and lenders transact with each other, have the flexibility to decide on loan duration and interest terms. 

STAY INFORMED WITH BITFINEX PULSE
Bitfinex Pulse is a social platform and news feed aggregator designed for traders. Use Bitfinex Pulse to publish your own content, share live trading insights, view and share pulses online, be the first to catch breaking news, and engage with the Bitfinex Pulse community.

SECURE YOUR PORTFOLIO
We are committed to the security of your assets to the best of our knowledge; that’s why we have rolled out several security features that you can enable and customize according to your needs to enhance the security of your assets and personal information. 

MANAGE YOUR PORTFOLIO 
Send and receive cryptocurrencies in an instant with just a few taps. Transfer between wallets and access your report to track your historical movements and ledgers.

RECEIVE BEST IN CLASS CUSTOMER SUPPORT
You can contact our customer agents at any time, and access training using our knowledge base.
 

WE CURRENTLY SUPPORT: 
Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Tether tokens (USDt), Cardano (ADA), Dogecoin (DOGE), Ripple (XRP), Polkadot (DOT), Uniswap (UNI), Chainlink (LINK), Litecoin (LTC), Solana (SOL), Stellar (XLM), VeChain (VET), Ethereum Classic (ETC), Wrapped Bitcoin (WBTC), Filecoin (FIL), EOS (EOS), Tron (TRX), Monero (XMR), Aave (AAVE), Dai (DAI), NEO (NEO), Kusama (KSM), Cosmo (ATOM), IOTA (IOTA), Algorand (ALGO), Maker (MKR), Tezos (XTZ), Luna (LUNA), LEO Token (LEO), BitTorrent (BTT), Avalanche (AVAX), Compound (COMP), Dash (DASH), Sushi (SUSHI), BCH Node (BCHN), Zcash (ZEC), Yearn.Finance (YFI), OmiseGO (OMG), 0x (ZRX), USDc (USDC), Basic Attention Token (BAT)… and many more! 
 ----------
*Disclosures 

*Not all products are available in all jurisdictions. To see if Bitfinex is in your country, visit https://www.bitfinex.com/legal/exchange/terms
*The camera permission is used to scan QRCode to help you fill API secret/keys

description.standard:
We’re crypto-obsessed and compliance-focused, making it safe and easy to buy and sell crypto. Create price alerts to stay on top of the market, set recurring buys, and build your crypto portfolio. Millions use Gemini to diversify their portfolios.

Whether you’re an experienced trader or just getting started, Gemini has the tools for you:

ADVANCED TRADING MODE
Upgrade your trading experience with trading pair discovery, advanced trading tools and additional order types. Trade over 300 trading pairs, depending on your location. Analyze crypto with candlestick charting, order books, depth books and more. View all your trading options, including limit and stop orders, maker-or-cancel, immediate-or-cancel, and fill-or-kill.

GEMINI REFERRAL CLUB
Refer friends and you can both earn up to 25% of trading fees for a year.* Our tiered rewards program complements our existing $15 USD referral bonus when you invite a friend to Gemini and they trade at least $100 USD.

THE GEMINI CREDIT CARD®
Earn crypto rewards on every purchase. Up to 4% crypto back on gas at the pump and EV charging,** 3% on dining, 2% on groceries, and 1% on everything else. Rewards available in 50+ cryptos. Cardholders can now effortlessly grow their portfolio by simply tapping or swiping their card. A Gemini Mastercard®. Issued by WebBank.

BUYING IS EASY
We make buying and selling crypto easy: buy bitcoin, ether, solana, XRP, dogecoin, and more instantly. Linking your bank account is simple.

SUPPORTED ASSETS
We support your favorite cryptos including Web3 and metaverse tokens. Some of the cryptos you'll find include: Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Gemini dollar (GUSD), Dogecoin (DOGE), Solana (SOL), WIF (Dogwifhat), XRP (XRP), Shiba Inu (SHIB), Litecoin (LTC), USD Coin (USDC), Avalanche (AVAX), Uniswap (UNI), Chainlink (LINK), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Filecoin (FIL), Tether (USDT), Fetch.ai (FET), Pepe (PEPE), Polygon (MATIC) and more! With more to come!

PRICE ALERTS
Create price alerts so that you can stay on top of the market and be alerted when the right moment strikes. Never miss a buying opportunity!

RECURRING BUYS
Schedule recurring buys for any amount and at any frequency, similar to how you contribute to your 401K, IRA, or traditional savings account.

GEMINI STAKING
Participate in the blockchain ecosystem and receive staking rewards on your crypto. Customers can simply and securely stake their assets and begin generating yield in just a few steps.

SECURITY & PROTECTION
Trust Is Our Product™. Our crypto storage system and wallet have been built by industry-leading security experts. We require two-factor authentication (2FA) for every account. You can secure your mobile app with a passcode and/or biometrics. We look forward to earning and maintaining your trust.

WEARABLE
Check your watch for crypto prices and receive price alerts and notifications on Gemini for watchOS.

WELCOME ABOARD!
Crypto is about giving you greater choice, independence, and opportunity. Crypto is not just a technology, it is a movement. Welcome aboard!

SUPPORT ALONG THE WAY
We are here to help you on your journey. For assistance, questions, and feedback please email us at support@gemini.com.

ABOUT GEMINI
Gemini is a regulated cryptocurrency exchange, wallet, and custodian that allows customers to buy, sell, and store cryptocurrency such as bitcoin, ether, solana, XRP, and more. Gemini is a New York trust company that is subject to the capital reserve requirements, cybersecurity requirements, and banking compliance standards set forth by the New York Department of Financial Services and the New York Banking Law.

All forms of investments carry risks, including the risk of losing all of the invested amount. Such activities may not be suitable for everyone.

*Terms and Conditions apply.
**4% back is available on up to $200 in spend per month (then 1% on all other Gas at the pump and EV charging purchases that month). Spend cycle will refresh on the 1st of each calendar month.

description.standard:
Buy Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Dogecoin (DOGE), Shiba Inu (SHIB) and 30+ other crypto assets in a tap. Okcoin is a secure crypto exchange that makes it easy to buy, sell, and hold your cryptocurrency with the lowest fees around. 

WHY CHOOSE OKCOIN
Get the fastest account setup, crypto education and tips, low transaction fees, industry-leading security, and reliable transactions. We make it simple for new investors to learn about and build their cryptocurrency portfolios. Download today, and start investing in crypto in minutes. 

FEATURES
Trading: Buy and sell Bitcoin, Ethereum and other crypto assets instantly.
Portfolio management: Check your dashboard to view your crypto portfolio and performance. 
Education: Learn about crypto as you go with education about assets and strategies for investors of all experience levels. Our learn content will keep you fully up to date with what’s new with Bitcoin and other crypto assets. Also learn about NFTs (Non-Fungible Tokens), Metaverse, DeFi, Blockchain and more.
Custom price alerts: Get notifications about Bitcoin and Crypto prices to buy and sell at the right time.
Live crypto charts: Find real-time charts with a full suite of technical indicators for crypto assets.
Recurring buys: Set automatic purchases to buy a small amount of a crypto asset at a time to have more control over your average price.

FREE BITCOIN
Refer a friend and split up to $50 in bitcoin depending on your region. With our referral program you can refer a friend and each of you can receive free bitcoin when they buy $100 worth of crypto using their local currency. See terms and conditions.

SUPPORTED CRYPTOCURRENCY ASSETS
Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Dogecoin (DOGE), Shiba Inu (SHIB), Solana (SOL), Terra (LUNA), Tether (USDT), Polkadot (DOT), Litecoin (LTC), Chainlink (LINK), Tron (TRX), USD Coin (USDC), EOS, Algorand (ALGO), MarkerDAO (MKR), DAI, Yearn.finance (YFI), Hedera Hashgraph(HBAR), Compound (COMP), Synthetic (SNX), Stacks (STX), Uniswap (UNI), Celo (CELO), Avalanche (AVAX), YFII.finance (YFII), Celo Dollar (CUSD), USDK (USDK), Near Protocol (NEAR), Aave, Cardano (ADA), Tezos(XTZ), Cosmos (ATOM), LunarCrush (LUNR), Cosmos (ATOM) Axie Infinity (AXS), Star Atlas (ATLAS), Crypto.com(CRO), TerraUSD (UST), Internet Computer Protocol (ICP), Decentraland (MANA), The Graph (GRT), FLOW, Enjin Coin (ENJ), Loopring (LRC), Zcash (ZEC), Chiliz (CHZ), Spell Token (SPELL), Arkadiko (DIKO), HKC, NYCCoin (NYC), Arkadiko (DIKO) and more crypto assets coming soon!

Okcoin was the first crypto exchange to list CityCoins such as MiamiCoin (MIA). More CityCoins are being created such as NYCCoin. Continue to follow Okcoin crypto exchange for new CityCoins listings.

CUSTOMER SUPPORT
Whether you’re an experienced crypto trader or brand new to bitcoin and ethereum, our customer support team is here to help. For answers and feedback, email us at support@okcoin.com. 24/7 support is available in English and Mandarin.

INTERNATIONAL CRYPTO PURCHASES
Buying Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other cryptocurrency with credit and debit cards is available in most countries outside of the US.

ABOUT OKCOIN
Okcoin is one of the fastest-growing and most secure global cryptocurrency platforms that serves all your needs for Bitcoin, Ethereum and other crypto.

• Our global identity verification process is more structurally sound and easier to understand

description.standard:
Create a free Coinme account today and find over 40,000 trusted locations to cash in and out of crypto. Coinme is a proudly licensed and regulated exchange since 2014. 

Here’s what you can do with the Coinme app:

BUY & SELL CRYPTO WITH CASH OR DEBIT
Easily buy crypto, such as bitcoin, ethereum, and dogecoin, and more, using cash or a debit card. Choose from over 40k+ trusted locations nationwide, including Coinstar Bitcoin ATMs, to turn cash into crypto. Or simply connect your debit card and buy crypto from your couch! 

TRACK CRYPTO PRICES AND MANAGE YOUR PORTFOLIO
Track your crypto balances and market values with daily, weekly, and monthly market pricing all from right within the app.

HIGHER LIMITS AND AUTOMATIC CRYPTO ACCESS
Now you can purchase crypto with higher daily and monthly limits than ever before. Plus, purchases made at participating Coinstar Bitcoin ATM locations are now automatically added to your Coinme wallet, instantly! Talk about fast.

SUPPORTED ASSETS
Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Litecoin (LTC), Polygon (MATIC), Chainlink (LINK), Dogecoin (DOGE), Stellar Lumens (XLM), and USDC.
Available assets may vary by location and purchase method.

INSTANT CRYPTO
No more waiting days for your trades to clear through online crypto exchanges. With Coinme, you can cash in and out of crypto instantly. We make it safe to buy crypto using cash or debit, and from your complimentary Coinme wallet you can store, send, manage, and receive crypto all in one place.

SELL BITCOIN FOR CASH PICK-UP
Easily sell bitcoin and crypto from your Coinme wallet for instant cash pick up. Select how much you want to sell in the app, then pick up your cash at over 20,000 ATM locations around the country. Limits vary by state and location.

NEIGHBORHOOD LOCATIONS YOU KNOW AND TRUST
Find thousands of locations near you to buy or sell crypto with brands you know and trust. Through our trusted partnerships with Coinstar and MoneyGram, you can rest easy that your crypto transactions are conducted at vetted, reputable establishments. 

RECEIVE, STORE, AND SEND BITCOIN
Receive crypto to your Coinme account or send it out just as easily. Prefer to HODL? Safely store your crypto with Coinme. Assets are secured with industry-leading, bank-level security. Your account requires mobile phone 2FA. Sophisticated anti-fraud analysis tools are employed to monitor for any suspicious activity.

PROUDLY REGULATED
Coinme has been regulated as a Money Services Business and State licensed virtual currency money transmitter since 2014. Coinme powers the largest licensed cryptocurrency cash exchange in the US, making it simple and safe to move back and forth between cash and crypto. 

WE'RE BITCOIN ATM EXPERTS
Back in 2014, Coinme became the first licensed Bitcoin ATM operator in the US. Fast forward to today, you can now find over 6,000 Coinme-powered Coinstar Bitcoin ATMs to instantly turn cash into crypto! 

PROTECTED CUSTOMER BALANCES
Crypto assets stored on the Coinme wallet are yours and yours alone. Our best-in-class custody solution utilizes cold offline storage to ensure all crypto assets are safe and accessible 24/7, regardless of what happens in the market or to other industry participants.

NEED HELP?
Visit support.coinme.com to contact Coinme Support via online chat.

ABOUT COINME 
Coinme operates the largest licensed cryptocurrency cash exchange in the U.S. Founded in 2014, Coinme was the first licensed Bitcoin ATM company in the U.S. Today, Coinme powers thousands of physical locations in 48 states to buy and sell bitcoin using cash through partnerships with Coinstar and MoneyGram.

Mailing address only: Coinme, Inc. 113 Cherry St., Suite 77544, Seattle, Washington 98104

Please find a full breakdown of fees per product at coinme.com/fees
Coinme is registered as a Money Services Business (NMLS# 1185542) with the United States Treasury Department’s Financial Crimes Enforcement Network (“FinCEN”). See coinme.com/licenses for more info.

versionHistory.releaseNotes:
- Hide spam/scam transactions:
Those annoying low value spam/scam transactions? You won't be bothered by them anymore, as we detect and hide them from your transaction list. Want to see them anyway? One simple toggle in Settings - General.

- Bigger Destination Tag button:
When manually sending tokens, the final confirmation screen shows a big blue "Add Destination Tag" button now. Can't miss it anymore!

- Smarter Destination Tag handling:
We've improved how we handle destination tags for self-custody accounts. Previously, some spam transactions made us think you needed tags when sending to regular wallets. That's fixed now - no more unnecessary tag requests!

- New XRPL Features Support:
This version adds support for exciting new XRPL features: Credentials, NFT Mint Offers, and Multi-Purpose Tokens (MPToken). You're now ready for the latest innovations in the XRPL Ecosystem!

This release includes minor enhancements and bug fixes.

## What's New

AMM Transactions Support: We've added support for Automated Market Maker transactions, enhancing your trading experience.
Remit Transaction Support: We've added support for remit transaction, making transferring multiple assets easier.
Clawback Transaction Support: We've introduced support for clawback transactions, helping maintain a fair and stable trading environment.

## Bug Fixes

 We've resolved issues causing the app to crash and made improvements to the user interface for a smoother experience.

 We've resolved issues causing the app to crash and made improvements to the user interface for a smoother experience.

Your favourite XRP Ledger wallet is now called Xaman. Now with Multi-Network Support to interact across various networks. Enjoy enhanced xApp functionality with easy account and network switching. Less network data usage, and extended account labels up to 64 characters.
New xApp Directory, NFT improvements, TrustLine & Sign Request updates, improved xApp loading, minor bug fixes, add Payment Channel & receipt signing.

This Xumm update ships a lot of improvements & new features.

This version we take our security from very good to great, Xumm now lists your NFTs and you can now pay Sign Requests with any asset you own: the XRP ledger's DEX will take care of instant conversion.

Furthermore we have made many small improvements to both the usability & looks of Xumm, making your interaction with the XRP Ledger and XRPL ecosystem even more fun to interact with.
Multiple improvements of existing features, addressing non critical bugs to make your Xumm experience even smoother.

This Xumm release ships the long awaited token filtering & sorting feature. You'll also notice Xumm got a fresh look. With Xumm paving the way for increased retail adoption, more xApps are visible, Xumm Pro got a prominent position & the XRP token now accompanies all other tokens on the home screen.
This version addresses a couple of small issues, making XUMM a little bit better once again.

XUMM 2.2.6 ships several updates & improvements, like: 
- Improved "Exchange" panel (market orders)
- XLS20d support
- Added support for new type Tangem cards
- Fixed 40 second sign request timeout error

This XUMM release allows you to select the XRP Ledger Network Fee & addresses issues with accounts with many Trust Lines, addresses an issue signing with the Tangem Multi Asset card, makes the "Swipe to Sign" button accessible  for the visually impaired & ships improvements for Multi Signing (we're working on something nice ;)) & the new XRP Ledger Tickets amendment.
This XUMM release doesn't ship major new features. Instead, we fixed some minor imperfections & improved overall stability of features. Thank you for using XUMM :)
This XUMM release doesn't ship major new features. Instead, we fixed some minor imperfections & improved overall stability of features. Thank you for using XUMM :)

- Fixed a bug where XUMM could crash when opening an item if visiting: Events - Planned tab - open a planned event.

- XUMM now supports network based reserve calulation. This means the current reserves on the XRP Ledger mainnet of 10 XRP (account) and 2 XRP (object, TrustLine / Escrow / Offer / ...) will be respected. If (in the future) the network reserves change again, XUMM will automatically adapt.

- When adding a token (TrustLine) to your account, XUMM now shows a warning message: XRPL Labs / XUMM does not endorse any token or issuer. Only proceed if you trust the issuer.

- Improved (easier) account r-address sharing: tapping your r-address / pressing the Request button on the XUMM home screen now opens a dialog to easily view/copy/share your r-address (text / QR / share dialog). The original XUMM Payment Request link generation can now be accessed from this new flow with a Create payment request link button.

- If your account is below the XRP Ledger reserve requirement, a negative balance will now be displayed at the XUMM home screen, making it clear that the first XRP deposited will go to satisfying the XRP Ledger reserve instead of your spendable balance.

- Improved network fee determination: if connected to a busy XRP Ledger node, the transaction fee is now based on network load instead of the individual (connected) node load.

... And more ;)

... And more ;)

- This release fixes a bug where XUMM would not start on iOS 12 & where multi signed transactions occasionally couldn't be combined.

description.standard:
Join millions of users around the world at Bitrue - the leading crypto exchange for hundreds of mainstream currencies and altcoins!

You can trade & store Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Tether USDT, XRP, Ethereum, Ethereum Classic, and a host of other cryptocurrencies. Bitrue boasts these advantages:

Safe, stable, and high-performing
- Bitrue has built a network security defense system after many pseudo-hacking attacks and RO tests. It adopts all McAfee's security solutions to ensure the security of cryptocurrencies, trading systems and users' accounts, and is certified by NSFOCUS.
- Advanced multi-layer clustered systems and hot/cold wallet isolation technology ensures system and assets security. Memory matching technology and easy-to-deploy cluster architecture with high elasticity best ensures that orders are handled smoothly without any delay.

One-stop solution for digital asset management
- Compatible with more than 150 currencies, and supports the storage of all digital assets such as Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, USDT, XRP, Litecoin, Ethereum and ETC
- Real-time market monitoring: You can view data indicators and follow market trends at anytime, anywhere, such as the price, rate of change or volume
- Store, convert, transfer and manage all cryptocurrencies at anytime, anywhere

Grow your wealth with passive income
Invest crypto coins in Power Piggy to earn daily interest payouts with no lockup period. Choose to lock them for longer and increase your APY.  Over 60 coins are supported including XRP, BTC, USDC, SOL, LUNA, ADA and more.

DeFi liquidity mining
Take part in decentralized finance with Bitrue's assistance. No need to manage private keys, run complicated operations, or pay high transaction fees. Just invest in one tap and wait for the interest to roll in.

Bitrue loans
No handling fees to receive an instant loan of cryptocurrencies. Pledge 30+ currencies to receive mainstream coins which can immediately be traded or invested as you please.

Low handling fees
The lowest trading fees in the industry! There are also regular events where you can win bonuses deposited directly into your account.

Full XRP support
Bitrue supports XRP as a base currency, allowing XRP holders to purchase other virtual currencies more conveniently while paying lower transaction fees.

Reliable team
Professional development team with superior expertise and senior financial experience working in renowned financial service and internet companies. Global Customer Support team able to provide round-the-clock services.

Let us know your comments and suggestions! You can contact us in these places:

- Email: support@bitrue.com
- Twitter: @BitrueOfficial
- Telegram: BitrueOfficial

description.standard:
Kraken Pro delivers all the security & features you love about the exchange, in a sleek mobile-first design for advanced crypto trading and funding on-the-go. 

—
WHY CHOOSE PRO?
—
• On-the-go deposits and withdrawals
• Fees as low as 0% 
• Consistently rated the most secure exchange by 3rd parties
• Hundreds of cryptocurrencies to choose across over 700 markets
• 24/7/365 global customer support
• Advanced trading tools with an easy-to-use interface
• Deep liquidity across all markets

—
700+ LIVE CRYPTO MARKETS
—
• Blazing fast websockets and real-time price updates
• Multiple charting and order book display options
• Intuitive depth chart and recent trade history
• Colorized sparklines and change% over time for each currency

—
ADVANCED TRADING FEATURES
—
• Go long or short on 50 different cryptos, a total 108 pairs
• Open and close your positions in bulk with just one tap
• Advanced order types and conditional close parameters to automatically set a stop loss or take profit on any position

—
ORDER, TRADE AND FUNDING HISTORY
—
• Complete history of all orders, trades, positions, deposits and withdrawals
• View current balances for each asset, in your preferred quote currency 

—
USABILITY AND DESIGN
—
• Built for traders - with a mobile-first design aesthetic

description.standard:
Introducing the Wirex App – Your All-in-One Crypto and Conventional Currency Solution! 

Are you ready to embark on a new era of financial freedom? Look no further than the Wirex app, your ultimate companion for seamless, secure, and efficient management of both crypto and conventional currency. With a user base of over 6 million people worldwide, Wirex is on a mission to democratise the financial landscape, making crypto and fiat currency universally accessible. 

Your Gateway to Financial Empowerment 

Gone are the days of complex account setups and lengthy verification processes. The Wirex app enables you to set up your account in just minutes, putting you at the helm of your digital currency universe. Whether it's Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, or any from the extensive list of over 100 supported coins including ADA, EOS, MATIC, and more, Wirex ensures you're in control of your financial journey. 

Your Crypto Journey, Your Way 

Wirex understands that diversity is key. Effortlessly switch between crypto and fiat, benefit from Over-the-Counter rates, and say farewell to exorbitant exchange fees. By using Wirex, you're saving up to 3% compared to other platforms, providing you with more financial clout for your crypto ventures. 

Rewards That Reshape Your Finances 

Experience rewards like you've never seen with Wirex's innovative approach. Cryptoback™ rewards, become your regular companions whenever you use your Wirex card in shops or online. Enhance your rewards further by staking WXT within the app, garnering up to 8% Cryptoback™ rewards and an impressive 20% AER on your X-Accounts. This isn't just an app; it's your key to maximising your crypto earnings. 

Empowerment Without Boundaries 

Boost your financial freedom with the Wirex card – your passport to spending crypto and fiat wherever Visa and Mastercard are accepted. No more friction – enjoy real-time conversion at point-of-sale and instantaneous crypto rewards. With complimentary ATM withdrawals, unlimited spending, and no monthly maintenance fees, you're in charge of your money like never before. 

The Future of Finance, at Your Fingertips 

Wirex offers financial solutions for everyone. Whether you're a crypto enthusiast or a newcomer, Wirex's flexible plans cater to your preferences. The Premium and Elite plans offer supercharged crypto rewards, with the added advantage of boosting your rewards further by staking WXT. 

Unrivalled Savings, Unveiled 

Meet X-Accounts – a groundbreaking, secure, and flexible way to save. Earn up to 20% on your stablecoins and up to 16% on crypto, all calculated daily and paid out weekly. Need your savings? Withdraw freely, with no strings attached. 

Unlock Potential with Wirex Credit 

Instantly borrow stablecoins against your BTC or ETH collateral. With no setup fees and no extensive credit checks, Wirex Credit allows you to access up to 80% of your collateral's value at 0% interest! 

Security Beyond Measure 

Wirex goes above and beyond to protect your assets. From anti-fraud technology to Strong Customer Authentication (SCA), your peace of mind is paramount, whether you're trading, spending, or HODLing. 

Your Partner in Financial Knowledge 

New to the crypto scene or an expert keen to stay updated? Wirex equips you with the resources you need. Join discussions on our Community pages, find answers in our Help Centre, or contact our Support Team – available 24/7. 

Join the millions already benefiting from the future of finance. Download the Wirex app today and step into a world where crypto and conventional currency coexist seamlessly. Features and availability may differ by region. Learn more at Wirexapp.com. 

Rewards and savings are calculated in Wirex Token (WXT) or X-Points. Feature availability depends on region-specific terms and conditions.

description.standard:
------- The Most Secure Wallet – Zengo -------

Zengo is the self-custodial wallet with no seed phrase vulnerability.
Protect and manage all of your cryptocurrencies with the crypto wallet that’s secure by default.
Buy, sell, trade, earn, and send over 380+ crypto and Web3 assets, all with the power of MPC security, a secure recovery model and unparalleled 24/7 customer support.
 
Since its launch in 2018, Zengo has not had a single security incident.
Whether you’re an experienced crypto user, or just getting started, over 1,000,000 customers trust Zengo.

Unlock even more security features such as multiple wallets, theft protection, self-custodial inheritance-like system, and an advanced Web3 Firewall all with Zengo Pro - our premium subscription service.

------- A Feature-Packed Wallet -------
Safe and secure crypto wallet – Never worry about losing your seed phrase again.
With Zengo's advanced cryptography, there is no seed phrase for you to manage. Instead, the responsibility of signing blockchain transactions is divided between us and our customers, so that neither party sees the other's secret information.
Welcome to the only non-custodial wallet where you don’t have to worry about losing your seed phrase!

Easily buy and exchange - Purchase and swap with your preferred payment method, including PayPal, Apple Pay, bank wire, and credit or debit cards.
Just tap on “Buy” or “Swap” and see the coins in your wallet within minutes.

Your Wallet Is Recoverable – Our 3FA recovery model ensures that you can restore your wallet on any phone or tablet.
Never lose access to your crypto again.
 
Legendary 24/7 Support – We make it super easy to chat with us whenever you need it.
Just send us a message from within the app 24/7.

Support 6 different blockchains: Bitcoin, Ethereum, BNB, Doge, Tron, Tezos.
Supports 4 Layer 2s: Polygon, Arbitrum One, Optimism, and Base.
Supporting hundreds crypto tokens, such as: Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Tether (USDT), BNB (BNB), Dogecoin (DOGE), Pepe (PEPE), Shiba Inu coin (SHIB), USD Coin (USDC), Tron (TRX), Polygon (MATIC), Uniswap (UNI), Maker (MKR), Kyber Network (KNC), Paxos Standard (PAX), and many others.

Desktop accessible - Securely manage and purchase assets from either your mobile device, or from the convenience of your desktop, both powered by Zengo's bulletproof security record.

Earn crypto - stake ETH directly through the wallet to earn rewards.

Multiple Wallets (Pro feature) - Organize and protect your assets by creating up to 5 segregated wallets. Separate high-value assets, payments, minting wallets, and public-facing wallets for ultimate security and privacy. 

Legacy Transfer (Pro feature) - Grant a beneficiary access to your digital assets in case of death or prolonged absence with a feature inspired by traditional inheritance systems but done the self-custodial way.

Theft Protection (Pro feature) - The industry’s 1st approvals process tied to your liveness 3D FaceLock biometrics.

Web3 Firewall (Pro feature) – With our revolutionary Web3 firewall, ClearSign™, we alert you to any unusual Web3 approvals or requests, protecting you from scams and hacks and “accidental approvals.”

Web3 Compatible – Connect with Dapps, use DeFi, and explore the new world of Web3 with our WalletConnect integration.
You can also view your NFTs directly within the app and safely store Polygon assets and use Polygon Web3 apps.
-Please note: ZK rollup-based apps are not currently supported

Use Zengo to transact with anyone in the world from the convenience of your mobile phone or desktop.
Receive real-time notifications when your transaction is confirmed.

Fiat Withdrawals – Cash out to your national currency anytime with just a few simple taps.
 
–––– Terms ––––
EULA: /legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
User agreement: https://zengo.com/user-agreement/
Privacy policy: https://zengo.com/privacy-policy/

description.standard:
Introducing Paybis Crypto Wallet, the ultimate all-in-one crypto exchange and virtual wallet app. With a streamlined user interface, unbeatable security, and cutting-edge features that allow you to buy, sell, and store crypto it's the go-to choice for all your cryptocurrency needs.

Universal Crypto Wallet and Exchange
Paybis Wallet provides users with a built-in digital wallet, enabling them to securely store, manage, and have full control over their cryptocurrencies. Paybis takes pride in offering an extensive array of cryptocurrencies for purchase, including Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Ethereum (ETH), Tether (USDT), Binance Coin (BNB), Ripple (XRP), Litecoin (LTC), Solana (SOL), Polkadot (DOT), Chainlink (LINK), Cardano (ADA), VeChain (VET), EOS, and more. Users can manage and monitor their diverse crypto portfolio within a single app. Experience hassle-free transactions and stay updated.

Secure and Reliable
Paybis Wallet provides a secure environment for managing your digital assets. Advanced encryption and robust security measures ensure the protection of your funds and personal information. The app employs industry-leading security protocols to safeguard your transactions, complies with AML/KYC Regulations, and protects you from fraud and scams.

International Reach
Join the crypto revolution from anywhere! Available in 180+ countries, Paybis Wallet offers exciting possibilities regardless of your location. No matter where you are, you can access the app and explore the exciting possibilities of the crypto market. Buy, receive, and send Bitcoin from anywhere!

Multilingual Support
The app supports 9 languages, allowing you to navigate and use the platform comfortably in your preferred language.

Wide Range of Currencies
We recognize the significance of accommodating various financial preferences. Whether you use your local currency or stick to popular options like USD to BTC or EUR to BTC, Paybis has got you covered from AED to ZAR.

User-Friendly Interface
Enjoy a seamless and intuitive user experience with the Paybis Wallet app. The streamlined interface caters to both beginners and experienced crypto utilizers, ensuring effortless navigation.

Powerful Tools
Enhance your crypto journey with Paybis Wallet's robust tools. Benefit from a crypto calculator for accurate price calculations. It also serves as a powerful price crypto tracker, allowing you to stay updated on market movements for all major cryptocurrencies, such as Polygon, Tether, BNB, Cardano, Polkadot, and many more. Paybis has everything you need.

Regular updates & Crypto news
Stay updated on the latest crypto market trends and prices for Bitcoin Cash. Paybis Wallet keeps users informed about the latest product updates and developments in the world of cryptocurrencies. Provides news articles and insights to keep you updated with the crypto market.

Payment Options
 Enjoy a wide range of payment methods to fund your crypto purchases. Paybis Wallet supports credit/debit cards, bank transfers, and alternative payment providers (Skrill, Neteller), ensuring flexibility and convenience to buy crypto. With its intuitive mobile interface, you can quickly buy Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Tether (USDT), Binance Coin (BNB), Cardano (ADA), Polkadot (DOT), or any other supported digital asset using your credit card.

24/7 Support
If you have any questions or encounter any issues, Paybis Crypto Wallet offers round-the-clock support. Reach out to their dedicated customer support team, and they'll be there to provide timely assistance and resolve any concerns you may have.

Unlock the full potential of your digital assets with Paybis Wallet - the ultimate all-in-one cryptocurrency solution. Join millions of users who trust Paybis for their crypto transactions and enjoy a seamless and secure crypto experience like never before. Download now and experience the convenience and power of Paybis at your fingertips.
